snippet.title: Uurnog Uurnlimited: Adaptive Music Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/678850/Uurnog_Uurnlimited/

This game sounds different every time you play it!

Did you know that half of Uurnog Uurnlimited's development time was dedicated solely to its audio design? Uurnog Uurnlimited uses an algorithmic engine (created by Nifflas himself!) and neural networking to change music on the fly based on what you're doing in-game. No two playthroughs sound the same, give it a look and listen in this new video explaining how it works!

For more information, visit http://uurnog.com/
